message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. This gives us both a good amount.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but time is money!
Time is precious Bob, and it's eating away at your share more than mine. Let's be realistic.
Okay Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
Still feeling generous Bob? This deal is getting worse for you by the minute.  Tick-tock!
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. I'm taking a small hit to end this now. Don't be greedy.
Alright Bob, let's be a little more realistic. This offer considers the time pressure we're both under.
Last chance, Alice.  Take this deal or watch your gains shrink even further. I'm serious!
